title: Determine If Date Is Weekend
description: In Python, the datetime module provides classes for working with dates and times. One common task is to check whether a given date is a weekend or not. In this challenge, you will write a function that takes a date as input and returns True if it is a weekend, and False otherwise.

meta.title: Python Date and Time | Weekend Detection
meta.description: Learn how to use Python's datetime module to check if a given date is a weekend. Detailed tutorial with code examples.
